channel.title: Character Rights
channel.description:
So I am trying to make it so on my server i can make a zone where only super donator/extreme donator can go. So like a special place with special benefit's for super donator/Extreme Donator.
[u][i][b]How it is now![/b][/i][/u] 0 = Regular Player, 1 = Moderator, 2= Administrator, 3= Owner 4=Donator
[u][i][b]How i want it to be![/b][/i][/u] 0 = Regular Player, 1 = Moderator, 2= Administrator, 3= Owner 4=Donator, 5= Super Donator, 6= Extreme Donator.
Thanks, Keith

item.title: Character Rights
item.dc:creator: @SurrealRSPS1 SurrealRSPS1
item.description:
@SurrealRSPS1 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:7, topic:523572”][quote author=SurrealRSPS1 link=topic=642118.msg4324443#msg4324443 date=1372656867]

Don’t use the staff rank for anything but the for staff ranks, servers also have the isMember variable that you can use for things like donor.

Yeah what he said make a separate variable for the rank to be given… Thats atleast what i’ve done. You could do isMember isSuperMember isExtremeMember could be worked out like that.
[/quote]

No, no, no, I don’t mean create a new variable for all of them. PI has both isMember and playerRights, they should use the playerRights for staff ranks and isMembers for donation ranks.[/quote]

Ohh okay, Sorry misunderstood that. I don’t mess with PI so I wouldn’t know

Read full topic

item.title: Character Rights
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“SurrealRSPS1, post:6, topic:523572”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=642118.msg4324433#msg4324433 date=1372656142]
Don’t use the staff rank for anything but the for staff ranks, servers also have the isMember variable that you can use for things like donor.
[/quote]

Yeah what he said make a separate variable for the rank to be given… Thats atleast what i’ve done. You could do isMember isSuperMember isExtremeMember could be worked out like that.[/quote]

No, no, no, I don’t mean create a new variable for all of them. PI has both isMember and playerRights, they should use the playerRights for staff ranks and isMembers for donation ranks.

Read full topic

item.title: Character Rights
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

You can have it like that? what’s the problem?

use the simple operators with an if statement.
example

if(playerRights == 5 || playerRights == 6) { //Tele here lol? }

Read full topic

item.title: Character Rights
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Don’t do that, thats to complicated (to me). Make a custom command like the ownerzone command, you have to have your nam on the command to tele, just make the commands for the people who buy.

Read full topic

item.title: Character Rights
item.dc:creator: @keithmitchell123 keithmitchell123
item.description:
@keithmitchell123 wrote:

So I am trying to make it so on my server i can make a zone where only super donator/extreme donator can go. So like a special place with special benefit’s for super donator/Extreme Donator.

How it is now! 0 = Regular Player, 1 = Moderator, 2= Administrator, 3= Owner 4=Donator

How i want it to be! 0 = Regular Player, 1 = Moderator, 2= Administrator, 3= Owner 4=Donator, 5= Super Donator, 6= Extreme Donator.

Thanks, Keith
